name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted (DS)
description:
Need for Speed: Most Wanted (DS) is a racing game. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by Electronic Arts. Need for Speed: Most Wanted (DS) has a Metascore of 45, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Need for Speed: Most Wanted (DS) on Nintendo DS. You can purchase the game on Nintendo eShop.
